Package fr.utt.lo02.projet.view.console

Class InitConsoleView

java.lang.Object
fr.utt.lo02.projet.view.console.InitConsoleView
All Implemented Interfaces:
InitView, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class InitConsoleView
extends java.lang.Object
implements InitView
Console implementation of InitView

Player interactions are hence console displayed text and integer reading from the terminal

  • Field Summary

    • thread

      private java.lang.Thread thread
      Console processing thread

      This is the thread that can be interrupted by the controller in order to cancel input reading from the console

    • getNumber

      private int getNumber​(java.lang.String msg, int min, int max)
      Returns the user choice as an integer

      The value is Integer.MIN_VALUE if the read task is interrupted

      Parameters:
      msg - the message to prompt
      min - the minimum value for the integer choice
      max - the maximum value for the integer choice
      Returns:
      a number between min and max
      See Also:
      ConsoleInputReadTask

    • getThread

      public java.lang.Thread getThread()
      Returns the thread of the reading task
      Returns:
      the thread of input task
      See Also:
      ConsoleInputReadTask
